documents.document: �You have options. You can either continue to be miserable or you can just accept the way things are.� -Ghost Town (2008)

I know life is hard but if you want to try to find a way, you'll find it. -Happy-Go-Lucky (2008)
RT @Fight4YouDream: Work for your dreams. Stay focused on what matters to you. Love your life in all of its beauty.
What makes life mean something is purpose: a goal, a battle, a struggle. -Frost-Nixon (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the stressful feelings in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
If you ever want something badly, let it go. If it comes back to you, then it's yours forever. -Indecent Proposal (1993)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Love yourself. Live every day with unbridled enthusiasm. Stay true to yourself.
Sometimes, being out of your comfort zone is a good thing. -Frost-Nixon (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the stress in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
The one you fight with the most is always the one who�s most like you. -Four Christmases (2008)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Stay away from negativity. Positivity is its own reward. Love life.
Destiny is something we've invented because we can't stand the fact that everything happens is accidental. -Sleepless in Seattle (1993)
I tried to forget the past. I ran away from the pain because I was afraid. -The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2 (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the anxious feelings in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Do it for your own reasons, or don�t do it. -Indecent Proposal (1993)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Turn your dreams into a reality. Live everyday like a beautiful adventure. Never give up on your dreams.
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the depressed feelings in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
In the end, the only thing you really own is your story. -Australia (2008)
Nothing beats being really honest about who you are and what you need. All the rest just works itself out. -Four Christmases (2008)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Be your own inspiration. Be your own inspiration. Stay healthy and positive.
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the depressing thoughts in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Music is a bridge between earth and heaven. -The Forbidden Kingdom (2008)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Don't let your dreams stay dreams. Achieve your goals. Never pity yourself.
Life always keeps back more surprises than we could ever imagine. -Elegy (2008)
What you get is what you get. What you do with what you get, that�s more the point. -City of Ember (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative sentiments in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
This is part of growing up: a little rebellion and a little adventure. This is healthy. -Tangled (2010)
RT @BePositiveQ: Every day is a new beginning. Trust yourself. Always believe in yourself.
Lovers are just like buses. You just have to wait a little while until another one comes along. -A Single Man (2009)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative monsters in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
You meet thousands of people, and then you meet one person, and your life is changed forever. -Love and Other Drugs (2010)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Live everyday like a beautiful adventure. Believe in yourself. Be tough.
Many a false step is made by standing still. -Lottery Ticket (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative emotions in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
At some point, we all have to let go. -Charlie St. Cloud (2010)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: No matter what, never give up. Stay thirsty. Be absolutely positive.
Just because you haven�t found your talent, doesn�t mean you don�t have one. -The Muppets (2011)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the nasty habits in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
RT @PositivesQuote: Always smile at life. Chase your dreams. Be bold.
If you can't laugh at yourself, life is going to seem a whole lot longer than you'd like. -Garden State (2004)
The further you run from your sins, the more exhausted you are when they catch up to you. -Inside Man (2006)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the unhealthy emotions in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
Try doing something. Actions count, not words. -Shame (2011)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Don't waste your life on nonsense. Love your dreams. Build a life based on success.
How come no matter how much you treat me like shit, I can't help loving you even more? -Happiness (1998)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the unhealthy habits in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
This is life, not heaven. You don't have to be perfect. -Gia (1998)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Life is a success-seeking adventure. Focus on your own goals. Be your own savior.
It might seem like the hardest thing to do, but you have to forget the guy who forgot you. -The Notebook (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative habits in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
She's not interested in me and there's really nothing I can do about that -(500) Days of Summer (2009)
RT @Motivated_Self: Be your own inspiration. Focus on your own life. Chase all of your dreams.
Things go up, things go down, but at least Lord is always around. -There Will Be Blood (2007)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative relationships in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
�Have you ever been in a room surrounded by people, but still feel alone?� -A Cinderella Story (2004)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Never pity yourself. Overcome your hesitations. Be audacious.
The important thing in marriage is not happiness but stability. -Love in the Time of Cholera (2007)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the worry in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
How important it is in life not necessarily to be strong... but to feel strong. -Into the Wild (2007)
RT @BePositiveQ: Avoid the negative. Every day is a new opportunity. Leave no opportunity unexplored.
I�m not making any plans. I�m just going to let the universe surprise me. -Hot Tub Time Machine (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the anxiety in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. -The Notebook (2003)
Be careful on how you judge people. Because you don't sum up a people's life in one moment. -City Hall (1996)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Stay positive. Your life is yours to live, make it count. Remember that adversity builds character.
�Good friends are one of life's blessings.� -Harriet the Spy (1996)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative vibes in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSNcPT
�There is a benefit to losing, you get to learn from your mistakes.� -Megamind (2010)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Love every single moment of life. Positivity is the best mood. Live everyday like a beautiful adventure.
They judge me before they even know me. That's why I'm better off alone. -Shrek (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative demons in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: No matter what, never give up. Don't let negativity drag you down. Be positively ambitious.
Relationships aren't just about being happy. -Sex and the City (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negativity in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
I will never stop trying. Because when you find the one... you never give up. -Crazy, Stupid, Love. (2011)
RT @PositivesQuote: Aspire to create. Don't let anyone disappoint you. Be original.
�If a problem can be solved, there is no use worrying about it..� -Seven Years in Tibet (1997)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of the negative energy in my life: http://t.co/FWq4OSvBYl
I don't avoid stressful situations. I'm just dealing with them in my own fucking way. -Insidious (2010)
RT @BePositiveQ: Work towards an exciting future. Turn your dreams into a reality. Stay focused on your own life.
If you gonna be the best, you have to take out the best. -Never Back Down (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How the demons of negativity were destroying my life and how I finally got rid of them: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Anger is dangerous. It makes people do stupid things. -Eastern Promises (2007)
�Don�t say we aren't right for each other, the way I see it is� We aren't right for anyone else.� -The Cutting Edge (1992)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Achieve your goals. Believe in yourself. Stop worrying and start living.
Whenever I'm happy, I get scared. Because I know I'll be sad again. -Dragon Squad (2005)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: how the demons of negativity were destroying value in my life and how I got rid of them: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
When a man does the same stupid thing twice, then that is because he wants to impress a girl. -The Lorax (2012)
RT @Motivated_Self: No one can do for you what you can do for you. Love your dreams. Focus on your dreams.
I tried to remember the last time I felt safe... and I thought of you. -Enough (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How the demons of negativity were screwing up my life and how I got rid of them: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
No matter how bad things get, something good is out there, just over the horizon. -Green Lantern (2011)
RT @Motivated_Self: Build a life based on success. Believe in your destiny. Never ever give up.
Kid, there are heroes and there are legends. Heroes get remembered, but legends never die. -The Sandlot (1993)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How the demons of negativity were messing my motivation and how I got rid of them: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
I'm usually a lover, not a fighter, but in your case, I'm willing to make an exception! -The Little Rascals (1994)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Be positively ambitious. Always remain positive. Accomplish your goals.
What value will there ever be in life, if we are not together? -Becoming Jane (2007)
